description.@en: You are charged with filling your days with funerary needs and your nights warding the graveyard against corpse thieves and tomb robbery. Thus, you have grown accustomed to just a few hours of sleep a night.

effect.@en: You may flip the results to succeed at Resolve Tests. When you succeed, it is always considered a Critical Success. In addition, you only need 3 hours of uninterrupted sleep to recover your Peril Condition Track.
